symptoms.name: Coughing fits
symptoms.severity: Variable, can be violent and rapid
symptoms.pattern: Worsens over time, especially at night; may last up to 10 weeks or more; can recur with other respiratory infections

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.severity: Can occur due to forceful coughing

symptoms.name: Apnea (in babies)
symptoms.pattern: Pause in breathing; may lead to cyanosis

symptoms.name: Cyanosis (in babies)
symptoms.pattern: Bluish discoloration of skin due to lack of oxygen

vital_signs.respiratory_rate: Increased during coughing fits; apnea in infants

physical_findings: Whooping sound (during inhalation after coughing fits)

supportive: Positive bacterial culture or PCR for Bordetella pertussis
